actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a waiver of minimum required distribution rules applicable to pension plans for 2013 and 2014.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to waive minimum distribution requirements for tax-exempt retirement plans for calendar years 2013 and 2014.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a waiver of minimum required distribution rules applicable to pension plans for 2013 and 2014.
